channel.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the A1(M)
channel.description: The latest traffic information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by the Highways Agency.

image.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the A1(M)

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A1(M) southbound between J4 and J3 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: The A1(M) southbound is closed between junctions J4 and J2, due to roadworks. Road expected to re-open from 5:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A1(M) J3 northbound access | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: The A1(M) northbound entry slip at junction J3 is closed , due to roadworks. Road expected to re-open from 5:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A1(M) J4 southbound access | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: The A1(M) southbound entry slip at junction J4 is closed , due to roadworks. Road expected to re-open from 5:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A1(M) northbound between J3 and J4 | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: The A1(M) northbound is closed between junctions J3 and J4, due to roadworks. Road expected to re-open from 5:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A1(M) northbound between J48 and J49 | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the A1(M) northbound between junctions J48 and J49, minor delays are possible due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A1(M) southbound between J49 and J48 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the A1(M) southbound between junctions J49 and J48, minor delays are possible due to carriageway resurfacing . Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A1(M) southbound between J4 and J3 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: The A1(M) southbound will be closed between junctions J4 and J2 due to roadworks, from 10 pm on 8 October 2011 to 5 am on 9 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A1(M) J4 southbound access | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: The A1(M) southbound entry slip at junction J4 will be closed due to roadworks, from 10 pm on 8 October 2011 to 5 am on 9 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A1(M) J3 northbound access | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: The A1(M) northbound entry slip at junction J3 will be closed due to roadworks, from 10 pm on 8 October 2011 to 5 am on 9 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A1(M) northbound between J3 and J4 | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: The A1(M) northbound will be closed between junctions J3 and J4 due to roadworks, from 10 pm on 8 October 2011 to 5 am on 9 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A1(M) northbound between J45 and J46 | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the A1(M) northbound between junctions J45 and J46, expect delays of up to 15 mins at peak times due to carriageway resurfacing , between 8 pm and 6 am, from 6 October 2011 to 8 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A1(M) southbound between J46 and J45 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the A1(M) southbound between junctions J46 and J45, expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to carriageway resurfacing closing two lanes, from 8 pm on 5 October 2011 to 6 am on 6 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A1(M) southbound between J49 and J48 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: The A1(M) southbound will be closed between junctions J49 and J48 due to roadworks, from 7 pm on 4 October 2011 to 6 am on 5 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A1(M) northbound between J47 and J48 | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the A1(M) northbound between junctions J47 and J48, expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to roadworks , between 9 pm and 6 am, from 4 October 2011 to 5 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A1(M) southbound between J16 and J15 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the A1(M) southbound between junctions J16 and J15, expect delays of up to 15 mins at peak times due to roadworks closing one lane, between 9 pm and 5 am, from 2 October 2011 to 17 October 2011.
